title: FizzBuzz in C# 8
content:
using System;
using System.Linq;
          
public class Program
{
  public static void Main()
  {
    Console.WriteLine("Hello World");
    System.Linq.Enumerable.Range(1,20).ToList().ForEach(x => Console.WriteLine(FizzBuzz(x)));
  }
  public static string FizzBuzz(int i)
  {
    return (i%3,i%5) switch 
    {
        (0,0) => "FizzBuzz",
        (0,_) => "Fizz",
        (_,0) => "Buzz",
        _ => i.ToString()
    };
  }
}

https://dotnetfiddle.net/m5aYNp
